page.title: 01NORTH WEST DUNDEE
page.content: Our area is located in the north west of the city of Dundee and extends beyond the boundary of the city into some fine parklands and agricultural areas.Dundee itself is an industrial city of approximately 180,000 inhabitants. The area contains a mix of industrial developments and agricultural land as well as a range of housing and leisure facilities which seem to us typical of the best of Britain today. Perhaps the best features of our area are the extensive Camperdown Park, Clatto Reservoir Country Park and water sports centre, and Downfield Golf Club, though we are also proud of the place Dundee (and particularly our area) holds in terms of industrial development and leadership.We are the home of both Timex and NCR, prominent in electronics.
